lyrics.text:
Ko e me’a eni,
Ke tau tokanga’i
Na’e tāupe ‘a e Eiki
Ki he ‘akau kovi.

Pea pekia ai,
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio,
‘I he fu’u mamahi lahi
‘I he’etau hia.

Ko e hifo ia,
Pea mahu’inga,
He ko e ‘Alo totonu
‘O hotau ‘Otua.

Pea kuo toetu’u,
Mei he pekia
Ko hono faka’ilonga,
Kuo ne lava’i.

Pea kuo hao,
‘A e maama hia,
Fakafeta’i kia Sīsū,
‘Oku ‘i ‘olunga.

Ko e ‘Eiki ia,
Pea ‘oku pule;
‘I he nima to’omata’u,
‘O hotau ‘Otua.
